title: Volleyball Fundamentals
description: Volleyball is a team sport where two teams compete to ground the ball on the opponent's court. Test your knowledge about rules, positions, and volleyball history.

questions.question: How many players are on the court for each team in volleyball?
How many sets are in a standard volleyball match?
What is the maximum number of hits allowed per side before the ball must go over the net?
Which position is responsible for directing the team's offense?
What is the term for serving the ball and scoring a point without the receiving team touching it?
How many points must a team win by to win a set?
Which player wears a different colored jersey and plays a defensive specialist role?
What is the term for jumping and striking the ball downward over the net?
Which international volleyball tournament is held every four years?
What is the height of the volleyball net for men's competition?
